alert.note: Alert for Grayson; Smyth (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 10:33PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Smyth and central Grayson Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 1032 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Marion, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marion... Sugar Grove... Mount Rogers National Recreation Area... Troutdale... Marion Wytheville... Hungry Mother State Park... and Atkins. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
